scripts.start-windows: powershell -Command "while ($true) { node ./index.js; Write-Host 'App crashed. Restarting...' -ForegroundColor White -BackgroundColor DarkRed }"
scripts.start-ubuntu: while true; do node ./index.js || { echo '\e[97;41m App crashed. Restarting... \e[0m'; sleep 2; }; done
scripts.nodemon: while true; do nodemon index.js || { echo '\e[97;41m App crashed. Restarting... \e[0m'; sleep 2; }; done
